body:
Hi Kimia, Honey bee cannot read breps (1, 2, 3) correctly, on the picture below: a b c
Try to draw roofs and ground floors of them as single surfaces, so your file works correctly. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/24rKmCGAvAN9hSYNiYm4zJE92*Yg9E9o0yuLKn7A7L5V-kobpBDmnY9yDjgt7fXp3M5A7y2hRQGkkK5WZMGW3yhCCejp3RYC/building__Perspective.png) Bests Antonello
